code: class  Solution  {   public :   int  pairSum ( ListNode *  head )  {   int  ans  =  0 ;   ListNode *  slow  =  head ;   ListNode *  fast  =  head ;     while  ( fast  !=  nullptr  &&  fast -> next  !=  nullptr )  {   slow  =  slow -> next ;   fast  =  fast -> next -> next ;   }     ListNode *  tail  =  reverseList ( slow );   while  ( tail  !=  nullptr )  {   ans  =  max ( ans ,  head -> val  +  tail -> val );   head  =  head -> next ;   tail  =  tail -> next ;   }   return  ans ;   }   private :   ListNode *  reverseList ( ListNode *  head )  {   ListNode *  prev  =  nullptr ;   while  ( head )  {   auto  next  =  head -> next ;   head -> next  =  prev ;   prev  =  head ;   head  =  next ;   }   return  prev ;   }  };
